name: Dinner Tonight: Pez De Tierra (Eggplant Fries)
description: The recipe translates as “Land Fish”, which I’m sure has a storied history. But I like to think of them as eggplant fries, however wrong that must be. I just wanted to toss them in a cardboard container and scoop...

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large iron skillet over a medium flame, until the temperature is 360°F.
Peel the eggplant and cut into french fries.
Combine the flour with cumin. Toss the eggplant to coat.
Fry the eggplant for about two minutes, or until browned. I liked mine a little crispier. But that’s just me.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper while still hot!
